job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Software Engineer (Full Stack) - Pareto Portfolio Company What you’ll do Full stack web/mobile application development with a variety of coding languages. Work closely with Product Manager to define feature specifications and build products leveraging frameworks such as React & React Native. Create engaging UIs using performant and modern React. Required skills Bachelors in computer science or equivalent. You produce readable, high quality code. Highly technical with strong hands-on coding skills. Fluent in at least one backend web framework. Experience with React or a similar framework. Comfortable with SQL. You prize reliability, simplicity, and robustness in building out systems. You communicate clearly and listen well. You are a self-starter and comfortable taking on a variety of roles. Have a startup mentality: team player, self-motivated, high-integrity, pragmatic, resourceful, can execute under pressure. Preferred Qualifications Masters in computer science or equivalent. Prior knowledge of Graphql, Redis, Elasticsearch and React Native. Prior experience with distributed systems and high-throughput services. Knowledge of AWS or similar cloud services. Location San Francisco
